channel.title: Internet protocol leak issue?
channel.description: Hello, I tried dns leak test on my windows workstation and noticed the webrtc shows my whonix local ip 10.152.152.* but no any issues in public ip (connected to tor), am i safe?

item.title: Internet protocol leak issue?
item.dc:creator: relben
item.description:
Thanks for the fastest reply

regards, relben

Read full topic

item.title: Internet protocol leak issue?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
LAN, internal IP address. Not yours. Same for all Whonix users.

github.com

Whonix/whonix-ws-network-conf/blob/master/etc/network/interfaces.d/30_non-qubes-whonix

## Copyright (C) 2012 - 2018 ENCRYPTED SUPPORT LP <adrelanos@riseup.net>
## See the file COPYING for copying conditions.

#### meta start
#### project Whonix
#### category networking
#### non_qubes_whonix_only yes
#### workstation_only yes
#### description
## network interfaces configuration eth0 to communicate with Whonix-Gateway
##
## static network configuration
##
#address 10.152.152.11
#netmask 255.255.192.0
#gateway 10.152.152.10
#### meta end

## for more information see interfaces(5)
This file has been truncated. show original

Read full topic

item.title: Internet protocol leak issue?

item.description:
Hello, I tried dns leak test on my windows workstation and noticed the webrtc shows my whonix local ip 10.152.152.* but no any issues in public ip (connected to tor), am i safe?
